page.title: 08POPULATION RELIGION
page.content:
THE POPULATION OF THE AREA IS 298, 103 MALES, 157 FEMALES AND 38 CILDREN. THERE IS A HIGH PROPORTION OF ADULTS OVER THE AGE OF 65YRS., PERHAPS DUE TO MANY PEOPLE RETIRING TO THE AREA FROM URBAN LIFE. {RELIGION} THERE ARE TWO CHURCHES IN THE AREA. OLD KIRKMAIDEN CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1638 AND IS STILL USED ONE SUNDAY PER MONTH. THIS CHURCH HOLDS THE CRYPT OF THE McDOWALL FAMILY, LOCAL LAND OWNERS MANY YEARS AGO. THE NEW St MEDANS CHURCH WAS BUILT IN 1903 BUT WAS KNOWN AS THE UNITED FREE CHURCH. FOLLOWING A SPLIT IN 1929 AN AGREEMENT WAS FINALLY REACHED IN 1931 TO UNITE THE CONGREGATIONS IN St MEDANS.
{ }
